AxMacroDictionary.Name: AssetDepCalculation_JP
AxMacroDictionary.Source: #define.AdditionDepRatioForTangibleOnOSL(0.9) #define.ExclusiveDepRatioForTangibleOnOSL(0.1) #define.RemainingDepRatioForTangibleOnOSL(0.05) #define.RemainingDepRatioForElectronic(0.05) #define.FirstYearRatioForElectronic(0.5) #define.IdleDepreciationMethod(255) #define.ChangeServiceLifeThreshold(2) #define.RemainingBalanceRatePrecision(0.0001) #define.AcceleratedDepRatePrecision(0.01) #define.AverageOverUseHoursPrecision(0.01) #define.DecimalsForDepRate(0.001) #define.UndepreciatedPecenatageRate(0.001) #define.NumOfDecimal(0) #define.CurrencyJPY('JPY') #define.LanguageJA('JA') #define.ParameterDate('yy.M.d') #define.ParameterYear('yy') #define.ParameterName('gg') #define.ParameterMonth('MM') #define.ParameterDay('dd') #define.ParameterYearName('ggy\'年\'M\'月\'') #define.JapanDateFormat('ggyy·M·d') //variables to calculate alloation periods for special depreciation #define.ServiceLife5(5) #define.ServiceLife7(7) #define.ServiceLife10(10) // Order to store additional reserve into container #define.PosForReserveDate(1) #define.PosForReserveAmount(2) #define.PosForReserveRecId(3) #define.PosForReserveTableId(4) #define.PosForReserveDocType(5) #define.AssetDocTypeExistanceCacheScope('JPDocTypeExist')
